firstPillOverride.ariaLabel: San Antonio Spurs @ New Orleans Pelicans

articles.headline: Warriors' Jimmy Butler ruled out vs. Suns with sore lower back
articles.description: Warriors forward Jimmy Butler, who was dealing with a sore lower back coming into Tuesday's game against the Suns, played just 14 first-half minutes and was ruled out in the third quarter.

images.alt: Warriors' Jimmy Butler ruled out vs. Suns with sore lower back

articles.headline: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic
articles.description: — Zaccharie Risacher scored 21 points, Nickeil Alexander-Walker had 20 and the Atlanta Hawks beat the Orlando Magic 127-112 on Tuesday night.

images.alt: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic

articles.headline: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights
articles.description: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights

images.alt: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights

vids.description: Victor Wembanyama spins into a one-handed dunk in the Spurs' overtime win vs. the Pelicans.
vids.headline: Wemby makes beautiful dunk in Spurs' OT win

track.trackName: NBA_One-Play (Wemby makes beautiful dunk in Spurs' OT win) 2025/10/25 ESHEET

vids.description: After Zion Williamson’s dunk, Victor Wembanyama gets revenge with back-to-back blocks in the 1st quarter.
vids.headline: Wemby denies Zion at the rim, twice

track.trackName: COM_SPORT Analysis (Wemby denies Zion at the rim, twice) 2025/10/25 ESHEET

vids.description: Zion Williamson starts the game with a poster on Wemby to give Pelicans momentum early.
vids.headline: Zion opens game with big slam over Wemby
